solution_line_template: He watched for {total_minutes_watched} minutes because {hours_watched} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{hours_watched}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes_watched}>>{total_minutes_watched}

This means {chore_blocks} blocks of chores must be done because {total_minutes_watched} / {cartoon_minutes_per_block} = <<{total_minutes_watched}/{cartoon_minutes_per_block}={chore_blocks}>>{chore_blocks}
He has to do {total_chore_minutes} minutes of chores because {chore_blocks} x {chore_minutes_per_block} = <<{chore_blocks}*{chore_minutes_per_block}={total_chore_minutes}>>{total_chore_minutes}
